seller_description: seller Description: Daily face wash for normal to oily skin sensitive skin. This foaming face cleanser removes excess oil while maintaining skin's natural protective barrier & pH. Removes face and eye makeup, dirt, and impurities.Facial cleanser infused with Prebiotic Thermal Water, Ceramide-3, Niacinamide & Glycerin. Suitable for face & hands
review: I bought the La Roche-Posay Purifying Foaming Cleanser to clean my jewelry, and I’m thrilled with how effective it is! The gentle formula removes dirt and oils from my rings and necklaces without causing any damage or dullness. The pump design makes it easy to dispense just the right amount, and it even leaves a subtle, fresh scent. While I haven’t used it on my skin yet, I’m impressed with its versatility and now consider it an essential for keeping my jewelry sparkling. Highly recommend for creative uses beyond skincare!
